[00:00.43]Talk - Why Don't We
[00:01.51]Zach Herron：
[00:07.68]It's not just me no you feel it too
[00:11.65]You know and I know we lost the lotto'
[00:15.65]It's like our love cut the line in two
[00:19.50]We're on different sides though lost in the echo
[00:23.39]Daniel Seavey：
[00:24.36]Our lips are moving they're makin' words
[00:28.20]Words turn to riddles we make it worse
[00:31.25]'Cause I'm not listening and you're not listening no
[00:36.39]We try to fix it it never works
[00:39.28]Jonah Marais：
[00:40.33]We go breaking up like cell phones
[00:43.24]When I speak 'cause you don't listen when I talk
[00:48.44]Dial tone nothing but that high note
[00:51.19]When you speak 'cause I don't listen when you talk
[00:54.91]Daniel Seavey/Jonah Marais：
[00:55.51]Ooh yeah don't think we'll ever get better better
[01:01.17]Gets worse with every letter letter
[01:04.42]Dial tone nothing but that high note
[01:07.34]On repeat 'cause we don't listen when we talk
[01:11.52]Corbyn Besson：
[01:13.57]If we could speak like we're trying to
[01:17.54]Share conversation communication
[01:21.75]I'm hearing me and you're hearing you
[01:25.59]On different islands just sounds of silence
[01:29.43]Daniel Seavey/Jack Avery：
[01:30.45]Our lips are moving they're makin' words
[01:33.31]Oh
[01:34.41]Words turn to riddles we make it worse
[01:37.32]'Cause I'm not listening
[01:38.30]I'm not listening
[01:39.30]And you're not listening
[01:40.33]You're not listening
[01:41.02]No
[01:42.46]We try to fix it it never works
[01:46.01]Hey

[01:46.36]We go breaking up like cell phones
[01:49.27]When I speak 'cause you don't listen when I talk
[01:54.40]Dial tone nothing but that high note
[01:57.18]When you speak 'cause I don't listen when you talk
[02:00.76]Daniel Seavey/Jonah Marais：
[02:01.65]Ooh yeah don't think we'll ever get better better
[02:07.18]Gets worse with every letter letter
[02:10.34]Dial tone nothing but that high note
[02:13.24]On repeat 'cause we don't listen when we talk

[02:18.40]Our lips are moving they're making words
[02:20.75]They're making words

[02:25.36]'Cause I'm not listening

[02:33.41]Oh

[02:49.71]Ooh yeah don't think we'll ever get better better
[02:52.45]Don't think we'll ever get better no

data.trans:
[ti:Talk]
[ar:Why Don't We]
[al:Talk]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.43]//
[00:01.51]//
[00:07.68]不止是我 你也感觉到了
[00:11.65]你知道 我知道 我们失去了很多
[00:15.65]仿佛我们的爱把这条绳子剪成了两段
[00:19.50]我们在不同的两端 迷失在回声里
[00:23.39]//
[00:24.36]我们的嘴唇在动 它们想要说话
[00:28.20]言语变成了谜语 我们让事情更糟
[00:31.25]因为我没听 你也没听
[00:36.39]我们试图弥补 但不起作用
[00:39.28]//
[00:40.33]我们决裂了 就像打电话
[00:43.24]我说话的时候 你不听
[00:48.44]除了拨号音 就是我们的吼叫
[00:51.19]你说话的时候 我不听
[00:54.91]//
[00:55.51]我觉得我们的关系不会变好
[01:01.17]嘴里吐出的每一个字都只会让它更糟
[01:04.42]除了拨号音 就是我们的吼叫
[01:07.34]不断重复 因为我们都不听对方说话
[01:11.52]//
[01:13.57]如果我们能好好说话
[01:17.54]分享 对话 沟通
[01:21.75]我听见我的声音 你听见你的声音
[01:25.59]在不同的岛屿 只有寂静的声音
[01:29.43]//
[01:30.45]我们的嘴唇在动 它们想要说话
[01:33.31]//

[01:41.02]不
